Posts.EditableText:
Alex,

While trying to sort out some problems I was having with TypeLib, Al and I exchanged versions of my ASL file - heavily annotated with comments.

When I tried to load the annotated file into QDK, it started to reject the file due to brackets and :-) type smilies in the comments.

No great problem, I could always edit out the offending )s but shouldn't the QDK ignore everything in a comment?

Just a thought - no great matter.

Frank

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for pointing this out, I'll take a look into it.
